notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: T.P.V. and C.-T.B. contributed to the design and wrote the review. S.R.P. and D.H. wrote the first draft. J.H. and H.W. contributed to the section on discovery and history. D.T. and E.S. contributed to the section on virology. R.J. contributed to the section on outbreaks. M.S. and J.J.W. contributed to the section on epidemiology.
